reviewText: If it was marketed as a legit system instructional video I would give it 3 stars, but it's priced appropriately and Oleg demonstrates some good info.  The audio isn't really timed right with the moves but he is good about making visual emphasis on technique.  It's a french dvd but narrated in english by Oleg himself and he does have a somewhat heavy accent.  I've been a fan since the first UFC's, seeing him pull off those rolling leg locks.  Not a serious step by step white to black belt kind of set, more off a 2 day seminar with Oleg(plus some footage of actual seminars in France).
Description of product not provided to adequately prepare buyer to make wise choice.
